channel.title: UIZE JavaScript Framework | Latest News
channel.description: UIZE JavaScript Framework (AJAX, RIA, widgets, JSON, OOP, Class Inheritance, XMLHttpRequest, DOM manipulation, and all that stuff)

image.title: UIZE JavaScript Framework | Latest News
image.description: UIZE JavaScript Framework (AJAX, RIA, widgets, JSON, OOP, Class Inheritance, XMLHttpRequest, DOM manipulation, and all that stuff)

item.title: 2011-03-24 - NEW EXAMPLE - Color Format Converter
item.description: The new Color Format Converter Tool lets you easily convert color values from one format to another.

item.title: 2011-03-23 - NEW MODULE: Uize.Util.PropertyAdapter
item.description: The new Uize.Util.PropertyAdapter module implements a mechanism for connecting two set-get properties together, with optional bi-directional value adapter code.

item.title: 2011-03-11 - Bug Fix For toString and valueOf Intrinsic Methods
item.description: An Internet Explorer specific problem with the toString intrinsic method and the valueOf intrinsic method, that are specially implemented for Uize subclasses, has been fixed.

item.title: 2011-03-10 - Improved Process for Announcing News
item.description: For developers of the UIZE JavaScript Framework, the process for adding news announcements has been improved and simplified, so that all that is required is to create a .simple file for a news item, and then the build process for the site will do the rest.

item.title: 2011-03-05 - Deprecated Features of Uize.Widget.Tree Killed
item.description: A number of instance and static methods of the Uize.Widget.Tree module that were deprecated a year ago have finally been killed.

item.title: 2011-02-21 - Unit Test Improvements
item.description: Unit tests for the UIZE JavaScript Framework have been improved in a number of ways, as outlined below...

item.title: 2011-02-11 - New ajax Method in Uize.Widget
item.description: The Uize.Widget module has been improved with the addition of the new ajax instance method.

item.title: 2011-01-31 - Major Improvements to Module References
item.description: Reference documentation for modules of the UIZE JavaScript Framework has been substantially improved, with the addition of automatically generated documentation for features of modules for which no documentation has explicitly been written.

item.title: 2011-01-22 - FRAMEWORK CHANGE: Non-inheritable Statics
item.description: A number of static methods that are implemented in the Uize base class, and that have (up until now) been inherited by all subclasses of Uize, are now no longer inheritable.

item.title: 2011-01-01 - Documentation System Improvements
item.description: The JavaScript Documentation System, that is used to produce all the documentation for the UIZE JavaScript Framework, has been improved in a number of ways.

item.title: 2010-12-19 - Various Deprecated Features Killed
item.description: A variety of features in various modules, that were deprecated over a year ago, have finally been killed.

item.title: 2010-12-18 - Introducing the DELVE Tool
item.description: The UIZE project is excited to announce the release of DELVE, a powerful new Web based tool that lets developers delve into the inner workings of pages that use the UIZE JavaScript Framework.

item.title: 2010-11-19 - NEW METHOD: Uize.isFunction
item.description: The new Uize.isFunction static method of the Uize base class returns a boolean, indicating whether or not the specified value is a function.

item.title: 2010-11-04 - NEW EXPLAINER: JavaScript Bookmarklets
item.description: The new JavaScript Bookmarklets explainer provides some useful bookmarklets that should come in handy when doing development using the UIZE JavaScript Framework.

item.title: 2010-11-03 - NEW METHOD: Uize.getModuleByName
item.description: The Uize base class has been improved with the addition of the new Uize.getModuleByName static method.

item.title: 2010-11-01 - IMPROVED MODULES: Uize and Uize.Data
item.description: The Uize and Uize.Data modules have been improved with better handling of certain types of objects when cloning and comparing arbitrarily complex data structures.

item.title: 2010-10-26 - NEW MODULE: Uize.Array.Sort
item.description: The versatile new Uize.Array.Sort module provides a way to sort arrays in a performance efficient manner using a custom sort value generator.

item.title: 2010-10-24 - NEW EXPLAINER: General Constructs
item.description: The new General Constructs explainer discusses a number of general constructs that apply across the entire UIZE JavaScript Framework, and can apply in application programming more generally.

item.title: 2010-10-05 - NEW EXPLAINER: JavaScript Testing Framework
item.description: The new JavaScript Testing Framework explainer discusses the testing framework that is provided as part of the UIZE JavaScript Framework.

item.title: 2010-09-27 - NEW DOCUMENTATION: Uize.Test
item.description: Thorough reference documentation has been completed for the Uize.Test module, which provides the underpinnings of the UIZE JavaScript Framework's unit testing system.

item.title: 2010-09-06 - NEW METHOD: Uize.Data.emptyOut
item.description: The new Uize.Data.emptyOut static method, implemented in the Uize.Data module, lets you empty out the contents of a specified source array or object, returning a reference to that source.

item.title: 2010-08-25 - NEW MODULE: Uize.Array.Order
item.description: The new Uize.Array.Order module provides functionality for changing the order of elements in an array, with support for reversing, jumbling, inside to out, etc.

item.title: 2010-08-25 - NEW MODULE: Uize.Array
item.description: The new Uize.Array module defines a namespace for various modules that provide array specific functionality or utilities.

item.title: 2010-08-17 - IMPROVED MODULE: Uize.Widget.Collection.Dynamic
item.description: The Uize.Widget.Collection.Dynamic module has been improved with the addition of support for the touch interface of Apple's iPad.

item.title: 2010-08-06 - NEW MODULE: Uize.Node.Util
item.description: The new Uize.Node.Util module provides a home for miscellaneous node related methods that are too esoteric to belong in the base Uize.Node module.

item.title: 2010-08-03 - NEW MODULE: Uize.Node.Classes
item.description: The new Uize.Node.Classes module is a package module with static methods to facilitate manipulation of the value of the className property of DOM nodes, with support for adding classes, removing classes, toggling classes, and lots more.

item.title: 2010-07-24 - NEW EXAMPLE: 3D Rotation Viewer
item.description: The new 3D Rotation Viewer example demonstrates how to easily create a slick 3D rotation viewer in UIZE that lets users rotate the view of an object a full 360 degrees using a mouse, or finger on the Apple iPad.

item.title: 2010-07-22 - Improved Unit Tests
item.description: The unit tests suite for the UIZE JavaScript Framework, implemented in the Uize.Test.UnitTests module, has been improved with the addition of basic loadability tests for all modules for which dedicated test modules have not yet been written.

item.title: 2010-07-15 - NEW EXAMPLE: UIZE Unit Tests
item.description: The new UIZE Unit Tests example lets you select and run any of the test modules of the UIZE JavaScript Framework.

item.title: 2010-07-11 - NEW EXAMPLE: Digital Clock
item.description: The new Digital Clock example shows how the Uize.Widget.SegmentDisplay.Seven widget class can be used to easily create a digital clock that shows hours, minutes, and seconds.

item.title: 2010-07-07 - NEW MODULE: Uize.Widget.Log.InstanceEvents
item.description: The new Uize.Widget.Log.InstanceEvents module implements a log interface for logging the instance events of an instance of a Uize subclass.

item.title: 2010-07-07 - NEW MODULE: Uize.Widget.Log
item.description: The new Uize.Widget.Log module implements a very basic logging widget, to serve as a base class for more specialized logging widget subclasses.

item.title: 2010-07-07 - NEW EXAMPLE: Button
item.description: The new Button example provides a demonstration of the features of the Uize.Widget.Button widget class.

item.title: 2010-07-07 - IMPROVED MODULE: Uize.Date.Formatter
item.description: The Uize.Date.Formatter module has been improved with the addition of the new {zzz} and {milliseconds} tokens.

item.title: 2010-06-29 - UIZE Adds Support For Touch
item.description: The UIZE JavaScript Framework has added support for the touch interface of Apple's iPad.

item.title: 2010-06-28 - UIZE Web Site Revamp
item.description: The uize.com Web site has been updated with a bright new look and usability improvements for the Apple iPad.

item.title: 2010-06-15 - Deprecated Event Management Methods Killed
item.description: A number of instance and static event management methods of the Uize base class that were deprecated back in early June of 2009 have finally been killed.

item.title: 2010-06-07 - NEW MODULE: Uize.Date.Formatter
item.description: The new Uize.Date.Formatter module provides methods for formatting and parsing date strings, supporting a wide variety of different formatting options.

item.title: 2010-06-07 - MIGRATED METHODS: Uize.Date.format, Uize.Date.toPretty
item.description: The Uize.Date.format and Uize.Date.toPretty static methods of the Uize.Date module have been migrated into the new Uize.Date.Formatter module.

item.title: 2010-06-07 - Improved Date Picker Widget
item.description: The date picker widget, implemented in the Uize.Widget.Picker.Date module, has been improved to correctly support date entry in a wide variety of different formats.

item.title: 2010-05-18 - NEW EXAMPLE: Animate Size in JavaScript
item.description: The new Animate Size in JavaScript example shows how to animate the size of an HTML element and how to apply amazingly realistic motion effects like easing, elasticity, bounce, and many more.

item.title: 2010-05-16 - NEW METHOD: Uize.escapeRegExpLiteral
item.description: The new Uize.escapeRegExpLiteral static method of the Uize base class provides a convenient way to escape regular expression special characters inside a string that is to be used as a literal match in a regular expression.

item.title: 2010-05-16 - Deprecated Methods Killed
item.description: A number of methods of the Uize.Color and Uize.Node modules that were deprecated back in the first half of 2009 have finally been killed.

item.title: 2010-04-30 - NEW EXAMPLE: Animate Position in JavaScript
item.description: The new Animate Position in JavaScript example shows how to animate the position of an HTML element and how to apply amazingly realistic motion effects like easing, elasticity, bounce, and many more.

item.title: 2010-04-25 - IMPROVED METHOD: Uize.substituteInto
item.description: The Uize.substituteInto static method, implemented in the Uize base class has been improved to be more robust.

item.title: 2010-04-18 - NEW MODULE: Uize.Fx.xShadows
item.description: The new Uize.Fx.xShadows extension module implements support for fading / animating the values of both the text-shadow and box-shadow CSS3 style properties.

item.title: 2010-04-18 - NEW EXAMPLE: Animated Buttons with Box Shadow
item.description: The new Animated Buttons with Box Shadow example demonstrates the UIZE JavaScript Framework's ability to animate values for the box-shadow CSS3 style property.

item.title: 2010-04-18 - DEPRECATED MODULE: Uize.Fx.xTextShadow
item.description: The Uize.Fx.xTextShadow extension module has been deprecated in favor of the new and more powerful Uize.Fx.xShadows module.

item.title: 2010-04-15 - IMPROVED MODULE: Uize.Template
item.description: The Uize.Template module has been improved with the addition of the new Uize.Template.defineStandardEncoding static method, addition of a number of new encodings, improvement of the existing @required directive and Uize.Template.encode and Uize.Template.decode static methods, and in a number of other ways.

item.title: 2010-04-12 - IMPROVED MODULE: Uize.Date
item.description: The Uize.Date module has been improved, with fixes for a number of issues, improvements to a number of static methods, and the addition of a thorough set of unit tests in the new Uize.Test.Uize.Date unit tests module.
